SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION:
STATE: The current state of this payment flow process. (pending,paid,failed)
REQUEST.CANCELURL:The client will be directed to this url if they cancel payment processing..
REQUEST.INVOICEGUID: The GUID of the aXcelerate invoice against which this payment will be applied.
REQUEST.REDIRECTURL: The client will be redirected to this url after payment processing.
REQUEST.WEBHOOKURL: This property is for internal use only.
RESULT.ERROR.CODE: The error code that occurred during processing.
RESULT.ERROR.MSG: Short description of the raised error.
RESULT.TRANSACTIONGUID: The aXcelerate identifier for this transaction. Only available if STATE is Paid.
RESULT.PLATFORM: The payment platform through which this payment was processed.
PLATFORMREFERENCE: The reference for this payment within the payment platform.
RESULT.OK: This property should not be used in new implementations. Use the STATE property.
RESULT.TRANSACTIONID: This property should not be used in new implementations. Use the STATE property.

PARAMETERS.NAME: reference
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The external identifier for the payment flow process.

DESCRIPTION: Returns the current state of a payment flow process.
